articles.author: Jason Owens
articles.title: March Madness: Zach Edey calls out Tennessee's Rick Barnes among his doubters: 'Can't do that anymore' - Yahoo Sports
articles.description: Edey was a three-star recruit with limited offers. How was the 7-4 All-American overlooked?
articles.content:
Purdue's run to the Final Four is a journey marked by redemption.
For the Boilermakers, it means moving on from the demons of 2023 and rewriting the narrative that's been squarely focused on their h… [+2631 chars]
